EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},

We hope you see the value Livongo brings to our 600+ clients but don't take it from just us! Check out this video of US Foods, Iron Mountain, and Windstream talking about ease of implementation, industry-leading member engagement, clinical results and cost savings with Livongo. Link:https://www.livongo.com/clientexperience.html
[Insert customized next steps with prospect].
I look forward to working with you on silencing noisy healthcare for our members. Link:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1hryo0JN-rA&feature=youtu.be
